law.catch_line: Exemption for governmental employers that provide equivalent leave rights.

text.section:
Sec. 11A-32. Exemption for governmental employers that provide equivalent leave rights.
This article shall not apply to any municipality, special district, or other local government entity that maintains a leave policy that:
Provides employees with at least the same rights to leave as are provided by this article; and
Includes an administrative procedure for its employees to enforce such rights.
